title: Elastic Thinking - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/20/19
itunes:title: Elastic Thinking - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/20/19
description:
George Noory and theoretical physicist Leonard Mlodinow discuss his theory of "elastic thinking," where humans think in new and creative ways to look for breakthroughs in science, and could even have been used in the business world to save changing industries like Blockbuster Video.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
